mapper.update: update point set point_use_type = #{pointUseType}, point_name = #{pointName} where point_no = 1

update point_save set point_member_amount = #{pointMemberAmount}, point_memo_amount = #{pointMemoAmount}, point_type = #{pointType}, point_rate = #{pointRate}, point_use_receive = #{pointUseReceive} where point_save_no = 1

update point_use set point_unit = #{pointUnit}, point_limit_use_point = #{pointLimitUsePoint}, point_limit_use_amount = #{pointLimitUseAmount}, point_limit_use_day = #{pointLimitUseDay} where point_use_no = 1
